ygData.subject: Re: Tongues, blue cons, and etiquette
ygData.msgSnippet: I ll look up the /con issue for you. When you get to higher levels, it makes more of a difference, because certain blues and greens ( high greens ) will cause
ygData.messageBody:
I'll look up the /con issue for you. When you get
to higher levels, it makes more of a difference,
because certain blues and greens ("high greens") will
cause you problems, when you might think they're easy
kills. <br><br>The named dwarf is CB (Rondo Dunfire, I
beleive)is around all the time. HAHA-- i remember the first
time i saw him- I thought he was a PC helping me take
on a tough Cent. Then I realized that this little
fellow was punching me!!! He is now KOS for me whenever
I'm in CB, and I always leave the tongue and give a
/shout for people who may be searching for it. (travel
to CB, you may get lucky and pick it up without
harm). <br><br>As for hide/sneak - anyone know this
answer for sure? I'd like to know, because a (a wood
elf) have had some probs with getting caught while
hiding. I have heard that if you /con a mob while hiding,
that you get a different message (ie. he looks at your
indifferently instead of threateningly). I need to try this.
BTW - those orcs and oracles in BB, near the bandit
camp, are usually a LOT tougher than the ones in CB.
After I was done raiding CB, I would still occassionly
camp that evil shrine for good XP. <br><br>Head to
Kelethin and visit my people!!!<br><br>Xela<br>Druid of
the 17th season<br>Xev
